title: I am 12 years old, 5’1, and over 170 lbs. Is this overweight or obese? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sadly, it is overweight. You are supposed to be 100 to 131 pounds. You need to lose around 40 - 50 pounds to be fit by what you’re stating. Now, I’m all for body-positivity. Curvy, Flat, Thin, Chubby, Tall, Small, everyone’s beautiful! But being overweight and slowly killing yourself is nothing to be “positive” about. Now, these next couple parts will just be weight loss tips. Now, you’re only 12, so I don’t want you to try anything dangerous. I would suggest for you just working out an hour a day. It could be just walking, or running, or a whole treadmill, or a workout app! Don’t STARVE! Just eat light. Maybe eat more rice and quinoa. If you put kale in an oven with Olive Oil, it’s really good AND healthy! Try a chickpea salad aswell! Baked asparagus, while it makes your pee smell funny, is your best friend. 500 calories is a pound! You usually can’t lose a whole pound in one day just with workouts, it takes around a week to do it the healthiest way. So I would suggest: Tracking your regular food intake every day. And I mean your REGULAR FOOD INTAKE, not a diet one! Get a notebook, or a journal, and write down what you ate, what time you ate it, and the number of calories it had. Then, find out the average of calories you consume, and cut 500 from that.Then, start your journey! Go ahead and start your diet + working out! I suggest eating, then working out, then eating, since that order prevented me from overeating when I was around 9 doing dance (trust me, I was CHONKY). You eat light, then work out, then eat after that, and you barely even feel hungry! Also, make sure to eat slowly, as your brain takes 20 minutes to get the signal that you’re full, and some of us eat quickly, which isn’t giving the brain time to receive the message before we’ve overeaten.Drink lots of water! Water helps your metabolism, and it keeps you from eating too much! Also, water is just good.Find fun ways to work out! Me personally, I go onto my bike and ride around, or I’ll pop out the ol’ Wii and do Dance Dance Revolution: Hottest Party 3 on Workout Mode! You might be a little sore, but as the saying goes, “No pain, no gain.”That’s all I have for you! I hope you do become a healthy weight, and you have fun! <3 But seriously, chickpea salad is the best. Try it :D

At that height and age, your ideal weight is between 110 and 120 lbs or so. A weight of 170 lbs unfortunately puts you in the obese range, defined as significantly overweight and potentially dangerous to health. Ideal Weight CalculatorGet whatever help you can from your parents, doctors, or family friends. Remove the processed food from the cupboards and fridge. It's important to get your weight under control now, while you're still young, because it will be that much harder for you as an adult.
